Gra legenda. Warto zagrać, choćby bo to by przypomnieć sobie co to były apteczki w grach fps. :P Gdy powróciłem do niej po latach czasem chciało mi się śmiać, bo projektanci poziomów czasami zapominają, że w kompleksie laboratoryjnym powinny obowiązywać jakieś przepisy BHP a tu w wielu miejscach np. brakuje barierek gdy stoisz nad przepaścią. Zresztą cała akcja by się nie potoczyła gdyby naukowcy nie byli idiotami i nie kontynuowali iksperymentu po tak licznych awariach sprzętu w ciągu pierwszych 10 minut gry. :P

Truly one of the greatest video games of all time. Half-Life is a masterpiece in every sense of the word.

Personally, I recommend playing the Source version, as I had some troubles with bugs on this one, but it is still a fantastic game nonetheless.

It also runs on even the slowest of computers, so you have no excuse not to play it.

I really REALLY recommend this game!! Beautiful story and really well made!
I love the sequel ([b]Half-Life 2[/b], [b]Episode One[/b], [b]Episode Two[/b]) and the 'DLCs' ([b]Blue Shift[/b] and [b]Opposing Force[/b]).
I also love the fact that the [b]Half-Life[/b] universe is conected to the [b]Portal[/b].

Overall a great game! [b]420/420[/b]

It's Half-Life, why would i want to make a review about this in the first place ? Go play it. Now.

I respect the game for what it is, but i'm not sure it's aged well. For one, i feel sick playing it and the controls are clunky. 

I prefer a game like red faction over half-life, but you must appriciate the world that is built from this game. From the first Half-Life, hours of lore is made and expanded on. 

But the controls and gameplay are rough and don't compare well to new games of a similar genre.

It's a close call, but I just didn't enjoy the game enough to recommend it.
Insanely great game Valve! Love the story, I'd recommend this game to every gamer!

关于分辨率：
开始-运行-regedit
找到HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\valve\Half-life\settings
看到screenheight和screenwidth了吗？想怎么改怎么改吧。实在不行把screenwindowed改成1，然后就窗口模式了。
